title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds conversation history, markdown rendering and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over REST, includes Docker dev env.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mixtral, CodeLlama and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert results.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client and typed structs for Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama as an async chat/embedding endpoint with admin UI.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that threads GPT-style answers powered by a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 with Ollama server and model cache.
